metadata.content: We Move Share the location of a walking, biking, or transit issues

home.tagline.one: Share the location of a walking, biking, or transit issue with our mobile app.
home.tagline.two: We Move is a web app created by Local Motion that allows you to share the location of a problem in your walking, biking, or transit network.
home.see.more.title: Youâ€™re the problem-solver.
home.see.more.description: We Move gathers crowdsourced information from people like you and creates a map of problem locations all over the city. Having a wider set of data shows patterns, and creates a much stronger case for advocates and neighbors to push for policy and infrastructure changes to improve walking, biking, and transit.
home.button.find.issue.label: Find a Reported Issue
home.button.report.issue.label: Report a New Issue
home.leave.message: Are you sure you want to leave? Your unsaved changes will be lost.

report.issue.label.issue.location.subtext: Place the marker or type the exact address.
report.issue.invalid.offline.address: Please verify that the address is valid (valid characters: alphanumeric characters, &, -, ', ., ,).
report.issue.label.feature.type: Select the Feature Type that you are reporting on:
report.issue.selection.other.description: Please elaborate in the Description field below.
report.issue.label.choose.image: Press here to choose image file. (<10MB)
report.issue.location.services.disabled: Enable Location Services on your Device
report.issue.uploaded.message.rejected-one: Our policy prohibits storage of explicit images.
report.issue.uploaded.message.success: The uploaded image has been saved.
report.issue.textarea.description.error: Minimum 10 characters required in the description.
report.issue.label.submitter.name: Name of Submitter:
report.issue.label.review.title: Review
report.issue.placeholder.submitter.name: ex: John Doe
report.issue.input.submitter.name.error: Invalid name. The name should contain at least 3 valid characters (valid characters: alphabetical characters, -, ', .).
report.issue.input.email.error: Invalid email, please make sure your email valid.
report.issue.issue.reported.success.message.two.offli: The issue will be reported when you go online.
report.issue.modal.offline.issue.posted.title: Issue Reported
report.issue.modal.offline.issue.posted.description: Your pending offline issue was successfully reported.
